name: Space Blast 99
description:
A simple Asteroids clone at its heart, Space Blast 99 was and still is an experiment in learning game development. The initial project stage to version 1.0 took me roughly 3-4 days and was done live for the most part on my twitch.tv channel. I do plan on adding a few more features and polishing the game up a bit more but I don't plan on spending too much time perfecting it as it was only a practice project.

Thank you checking out this game and thanks in advance for downloading it.
